dimensions: Warp: 154 cm (60 3/4 in.). Weft: 85 cm. (33 1/2 in.) Both selvedges present. Pattern: height of repeat: 102.5 cm (40 1/4 in). End of plate line visible under the horse. Printing plate was wider than the fabric so printing extends over the edge of the fabric and some of the pattern is missing but fabric was probably designed so that lengths would be sewn together as a straight repeat.
title: Textile
medium: Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation
description: Several scenes illustrating episodes in the life of Henri IV, including battle scenes, amorous scenes and a building with the horseshoe staircase at Fontainebleau. In brown (sepia) on white.
name: Textile
